thread.title: Faruk Mermercioğlu

author: Faruk Mermercioğlu
title: Faruk Mermercioğlu
text:
Many thanks to Ms Louise -Customer Care Leader- for getting detailed information for the eventual supply of spare parts for my 87 model Ford Escort .The information she has provided is vital for the up-keep of my old car and it was accurate be.
Please be assured that I will not hesitate to contact you for my eventual inquiries.
Sincerely,
Faruk Mermercioğlu
